name: QFeverTestsForCoxiellaBurnetiiNucleicAcid
title: Q Fever (Tests for Coxiella burnetii Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Coxiella burnetii nucleic acid.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Coxiella burnetii Nucleic Acid;  

LOINC search: Coxiella burnetii (“nucleic acid” OR sequencing)),(Exclusion Criteria: implanted device)
